text: League 6 of the MŽRKL, or Superleague, took place between 28 December 2015 and it will end on 11 February 2016. The four best ranked teams advanced to the Final Four. The points against teams from the same preliminary round were taken over. ==Standings== {| class="wikitable" !Place !Team !Pld !W !L !PF !PA !Diff !Pts ! |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |1. || Budućnost Bemax ||10 ||9 ||1 ||665 ||600 ||+65 ||19 |rowspan="4"|Final Four |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |2. || Radivoj Korać ||10 ||6 ||4 ||701 ||655 ||+46 ||16 |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |3. || Medveščak (-1) ||10 ||5 ||5 ||574 ||576 ||-2 ||14 |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |4. || Kvarner ||10 ||4 ||6 ||600 ||623 ||-23 ||14 |- |5. || Čelik Zenica ||10 ||4 ||6 ||599 ||602 ||-3 ||14 |rowspan="2"| |- |6. || Triglav Kranj ||10 ||2 ||8 ||606 ||689 ||-83 ||12 |} ==Fixtures/Results== All times given below are in Central European Time. ===Game 1=== \---- \---- ===Game 2=== \---- \---- ===Game 3=== \---- \---- ===Game 4=== \---- \---- ===Game 5=== \---- \---- ===Game 6=== \---- \---- ==External links== *Official website *MŽRKL 2015–16 League 6 at srbijasport.net League 6 Category:2015–16 in Serbian basketball Category:2015–16 in Bosnia and Herzegovina basketball Category:2015–16 in Montenegrin basketball Category:2015–16 in Croatian basketball Category:2015–16 in Slovenian basketball
